snippet: The former police official was convicted of crimes against humanity and homicide in the 1980 siege of the Spanish Embassy that ended in a fire, killing 37 people.
abstract: Guatemalan tribunal convicts Pedro Garcia Arredondo, former leader of special police unit, of crimes against humanity and homicide for deaths of 37 people in 1980 siege of Spanish Embassy.
lead_paragraph: The former police official was convicted of crimes against humanity and homicide in the 1980 siege of the Spanish Embassy that ended in a fire, killing 37 people.
